title: twitch or corki
body: almost got 3150 and need a new adc for the pool so? i like the mechanics of both champs and the champs themselves when ive played them of f2p, so its a tough one. opinions?

replies.body: I like corkis range and mobility
i went corki and will pick twitch up next, thanks everyone fore the input {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I like Twitch but Corki is the far stronger pick at the moment.
I prefer Twitch personally but Corki is stronger right now...

Corki is a top 3 ADC right now. Super strong and doesnt need much help to be useful.

Twitch requires your team to have a really strong frontline in order to maximise his effectiveness, otherwise he can be pretty mediocre.

Here's my 2 cents:

+ {{champion:42}} **Corki** is definitely the better pick right now, but I doubt he'll stay like that for long. He's due for nerfs soon.

+ {{champion:29}} **Twitch** struggles against the popular ADC's right now, such as **Lucian** and **Corki**. But he's considered by his player base to be hidden OP. He melts tanks and is the best teamfight ADC in the game. He can single-handedly turn fights in the late game.

If you think you can outplay aggressive ADC's and assassins right now, then definitely go **Twitch**. Otherwise, **Corki** is the safe pick.
